title: La Salle Univ Flex 2
description:
Property Description
Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space. Gorgeously renovated, everything is brand new. Located on a quiet street in Germantown. Stunning flex 2 bedroom apartment has exposed brick wall. High ceilings, new hardwood flooring, beautiful new cabinets. Quartz countertops, subway backsplash, contemporary light features throughout. Enjoy the privately fenced deck and seating area.
Features:
*Luxe Private Flex 2 Apt
*Outdoor Deck
*1 Full Bed + 1 Sofa Bed
*Designer Bathroom
*Full Eat-In-Kitchen Kitchen
*Complimentary Coffee & Tea
*Minutes from Popular Sites & Major Hospitals
*New Stainless Appliances
*Fast WiFi/Internet & Netflix
*Central Heating & AC Unit
- Living Room: Features a bright, sunny and well curated living area with one (1) Sleeper Sofa Bed,  a Flat Screen SmartTV (for streaming Netflix, etc.), Free high-speed Internet/WiFi, air conditioning unit & central heating system and comfortable lighting.
- Kitchen: All New Appliances - Electric Oven/Range, Refrigerator, Microwave; Dining room table, fully stocked kitchen with utensils and cooking supplies. New Toaster, Coffee Maker and pots & pans to make home-cooked meals. We also offer free complimentary coffee & tea.
- Bathroom: Stylish new bathroom with high-end finishes such as down lighting, luxury tiles & vanity, fresh bath linens and free complementary toiletries (limited supply).
- Sleeping: Bedroom has one (1) new Queen-size bed, closet and windows for fresh air & natural sunlight.
- Early check-in/late check-out available upon request (Must contact us for pre-approval).
*You are renting our personal home, this is not owned by a hotel. Please treat it with love and respect.
**All damages will be repaired at your personal expense.
Guest access
Our place can be reached via The Southeastern Pennsylvania Transportation Authority (SEPTA), which is a regional public transportation authority that operates bus, rapid transit, commuter rail, light rail, and electric trolleybus services for nearly 4 million people in five counties in and around Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

title: 2 Bedroom/ 1.5 bath with Roof Deck and optional parking
description:
Amazing Rittenhouse Square Apartment available less than a block from Rittenhouse Square and all that the neighborhood has to offer. The Apartment is located on Spruce Street between 17th and 18th Street. The building consists of 6 apartments. This apartment has 2 bedrooms and 1.5 baths, though the apartment is best used as a 1 bedroom with a den/office. Although the apartment is on the second floor of the building, it feels like you are in your own townhouse.
The Apartment is 2 floors. First floor as a large living room, a large dining room, kitchen, half bath and laundry. Second floor has a large bedroom with attached full bath. There is a second, smaller room that has access to a private roof deck.
We are moving out early as we have bought a house. As a result, our landlord requires you to sign a 12-month lease at our current rent of $2152, or you can sign a 6-month lease and pay $2252.
Additionally, you will have the opportunity to rent the buildings parking spaces (there is enough room for 2 cars if you stack them one behind the other). the parking spaces are $400 additional a month, bringing the total to $2552 all in with parking. This is a rare opportunity and one that is not offered often.
If interested, please respond to this ad via email. We are moving out November 1, so ideally the apartment will be available that weekend.

title: Balcony, New Kitchen, Hardwood floors, Cat Friendly, Lot of Light
description:
The apartment is a mother-in-law suite, which means you go through the owners house to get to the apartment. Because of that, we are being really careful who we rent to. We would prefer a couple or single person, who loves their own space, but will respect our space as they go through. No parties are allowed. The rent is lower than normal for this size apartment.
Huge One bedroom apartment with an extra room that can be curtained off or used as a den. The apartment has tons of gorgeous natural light. There are six closets in the apartment so it has a lot of storage. Hardwood floors through out. Balcony overlooking the corner of 48th and Cedar.
New kitchen with granite countertops, subway tile, and appliances. Garage disposal too.
Cats are ok, but no dogs. We have a dog though so you must like dogs.
There is a Washer and Dryer in the building. Tenants pay electrical and gas. Gas bill is only for the stove.
This apartment is a block from Baltimore Avenue, 4 blocks from Clark Park, a block from Mariposa Grocery store, Local Pez, Gold Standard, and near many restaurants and bars. Its a great family friendly neighborhood with large trees.

description:
Apartment for rent!
We are looking for a renter for our beautiful, spacious, well-lit apartment in West Philadelphia / University City beginning December 1, 2022. There will be a 4 month sublet from December until mid-March, with an option to stay on starting in mid-March 2023 as a regular renter.
This one bedroom apartment in West Philadelphia / University City sits above street level and has a private entrance with a private gated yard. The apartment has a large kitchen with room for a table, well-lit living room with 5 beautiful windows, and a spacious bedroom with a closet and ample room for storage. The apartment has central air conditioning and heat. There is shared laundry in the basement. Cats and dogs are also welcome! This apartment is not furnished except for kitchen appliances. This apartment is great for one person or a couple, and also great for students.
Tenant pays for all utilities and pays a flat water fee to the landlords each month.
This apartment is located close to all of Baltimore Ave’s local restaurants and shops, a few blocks from Clark Park and the Farmer’s Market. Close to the 34 and 13 trolley lines, multiple bus routes, and a short walk to the Market Frankford Line. There is ample free street parking as well.

description:
A budget-friendly extended stay hotel in Bethlehem, PA
We invite you to experience the conveniences of home at WoodSpring Suites® Allentown Bethlehem. Our all-suite hotel with in-room kitchens is the perfect choice for your extended stay, whether it’s for a week, a month, or longer. We offer low nightly, weekly, and monthly hotel rates to help save you money. Plus, you'll enjoy free WiFi, guest laundry facilities and free parking at our 100% smoke-free, pet-friendly property, making your stay simple and hassle-free.
You'll enjoy quick access to a variety of destinations and attractions when you stay at our hotel in Bethlehem, Pennsylvania. If you’d like to take advantage of public transportation, we're right on the 108, 217, 319, and 327 local LANta bus routes, while the Amtrak Bus Station is just 6 miles away. We're about 8 miles from the Lehigh Valley International Airport/ABE Airport. $50 to $100 Deposit.
Hotel at a Glance
5 miles to Lehigh Valley Hospital Muhlenberg
6 miles to St. Luke’s Hospital Anderson Campus
6 miles to Greyhound and Amtrak stations
8 miles to Lehigh Valley International Airport
Nightly, weekly and monthly hotel rates
Full kitchen in every room
Guest Rooms
Visit our extended stay hotel and select the suite layout that meets your needs. Each layout features a combination of double-/full-sized beds and sleeper sofas, as well as a dresser, nightstand and shelves. All suites also include a kitchen with full-size refrigerator, stovetop, microwave, cupboards and prep sink. Sit back and relax during your stay while enjoying free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with cable/satellite and a premium movie channel. Every-other-week housekeeping services are provided for long-stay guests. Additional items—including a linen exchange, cookware, dishes, and more frequent housekeeping—are available for purchase at the front desk.
Explore activities for all ages in Allentown Bethlehem
You're in the heart of it all when you stay at WoodSpring Suites in Allentown Bethlehem, where you'll find a variety of exciting attractions and destinations. History buffs will enjoy visiting the nearby Pennsbury Manor, the reconstructed estate of William Penn, who founded the Pennsylvania colony. We're also an easy drive to a number of family friendly activities, including Crayola Experience, Dorney Park and Wildwater Kingdom, and Lehigh Valley Zoo. Artists and creative types will want to check out the Banana Factory Arts Center, a collection of galleries and arts programs partly housed in a former banana distribution warehouse, about 9 miles away.
Show Less
Pet Policy
Service animals are welcome at no additional charge, must be registered at front desk. Limit 2 dogs, under 75 lbs. per room. No cats. Non-refundable pet fees, 50 USD a pet reg fee and 10 USD a pet per night charge for the duration of the stay.
Hotel Alert: Some hotel features and amenities may be modified or unavailable due to COVID-19. For more information, please call your hotel directly.
Amenities to help you stay awhile
WoodSpring Suites is an extended stay hotel with clean and comfortable rooms, and a professional, friendly staff that’s available to assist you 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Many upgrades: hardwood floors on main and upper level, central vac, deck, siding (2022), remodel of lower level (2022). Newer roof, HVAC and windows make this home worry free. On those cold nights, the wood stove will surely keep you warm. Laundry room with door to the outside. Plenty of storage and oversized 2 car garage. Sit and  relax on the upper deck or patio. Nothing to do but unpack.

title: Newly and Beautifully renovated ADORABLE 1BED, 1BATH.
description:
Newly and Beautifully renovated 1Bed 1Bath in West Lawn for rent and currently available. All one-floor living, bottom floor living, One large bedroom, One full bathroom, laundry room with washer and dryer included, Hallway linen closet/Pantry, and full kitchen/dining room/living room open concept living. In a quiet area of West Lawn and located conveniently close to highways and many stores/restaurants. Renovations include all new flooring throughout, every room repainted, new backsplash and cabinets painted with new pull handle, and all-new lighting w LED lights.  please. First month ($700.00), last month ($700.00), AND one month ($700.00) Security Deposit due upon signing the lease.

.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
A little about the home- 4 bedroom house. Home is literally down the street from 5 and 605 freeway entrance and conveniently located close to Santa Fe Springs, Pico Rivera, Downey, and Whittier. Three and one currently live at the home. Ages range from 32-40. Looking for someone who is easy going, responsible, a working professional, student, or military. There is a very relaxed vibe at the house. Everyone gets along great, and looking for someone who will be compatible with other roommates. Room is for one person only and will share a hallway bathroom with two other . No pets. preferred.
Rent will be $850 paid at the beginning of the month. Utilities are included in the rent. $850 deposit. Clearance of a background and credit check required before moving in which will cost around $40. Room will be ready to move into on October 1st.
The unit features:
-in unit washer/dryer
-a very well equipped, furnished kitchen
-huge pool/courtyard with gas grill, lounge chairs & tables
-Tv with several streaming services available in common area
Master Bedroom and in suite bathroom for rent in San Fernando. Move in date is September 1st, 2022. Month to Month lease (ideally will be here at least 3 months - but flexible)! The apartment is a renovated 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom top floor/corner unit with an open floor plan, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors, spacious bedrooms, and a patio with a nice city view. Rent is $435/month (very low compared to the area)! Designated parking in a secure gated garage (tandem). Utility Bills are separate (which you’d pay directly to me - average about $100 every 2 months or so). Laundry on site.
I moved into this apartment in December 2019 with my best friend. She just bought a house so here we are! We’re normal, hard working girls so would love to find someone to match that same energy. This is a VERY well priced apartment for the area.
The private bedroom/bathroom you'd have is extremely spacious. Hardwood floors. Tons of natural night. Large closet with lots of storage space. In suite bathroom with stand up shower. My roommate would also be willing to sell some of her furniture (including the bed, headboard, desk, tv stand, and a few others items). If you are intersted in purchasing these please let me know!
About Me:
I’m a laid back, but hard working looking for a professional | roommate (change wording) around 25-45ish who is organized, respectful, and not the biggest of partiers. I’m working remotely, so ideally you’d go to the office on a daily basis, but again I’m flexible here if that’s not the case. I have a medium size dog who is very timid but the sweetest thing, so liking dogs would be a big plus! I love the outdoors. Oh and I may have a slight plant obsessions.

title: 5 Bed/3 Bath House
description: Welcome to 207 E. Willow Grove Ave! A Charming and well maintained 5 bedroom 3 bathroom home in the heart of Chestnut Hill! This spacious stone and brick 3 story feels more like a single home with its side entrance, high ceilings and original details throughout. Upon entry, you are greeted by a beautiful open living space with an open staircase, parquet hardwood floors, wood burning fireplace, original built in bookcases, large windows with deep window sills and new window treatments. The dining room has wonderful original details with leaded glass doors on two storage closets/cabinets, incredible detailed moldings and wonderful space for gathering. The kitchen has been recently updated and has brand new stainless steel appliances and leads to the mudroom, laundry room, and back yard. The second floor features a very wide hallway with access to a back staircase to the kitchen, three spacious and bright bedrooms and one full bathroom with a claw foot tub. The third floor offers two additional bedrooms and a full bath. Enjoy the outdoors in the delightful and low maintenance back garden or on the wrap around front porch. A block to Germantown Avenue, enjoy all the offerings and conveniences of living in Chestnut Hill. Close to Wissahickon Trails, The Morris Arboretum, Woodmere Art Museum and so much more.
